sentences.sContent: Botany The hood-shaped sepal or corolla of some flowers.
sentences.sContent_eng: Botany The hood-shaped sepal or corolla of some flowers.
sentences.sCn: 盔状花冠（或花萼）：某些花朵盔状的花萼或花冠。

sentences.sContent: A flower is made up of four parts:the sepal, petal, stamen and pistil.
sentences.sContent_eng: A flower is made up of four parts:the sepal, petal, stamen and pistil.
sentences.sCn: 一朵花由四部分组成：花萼，花瓣，雄蕊和雌蕊。

sentences.sContent: Leave away the sepal and crash the petal parts. Preheat the oven to 175C/350F.
sentences.sContent_eng: Leave away the sepal and crash the petal parts. Preheat the oven to 175C/350F.
sentences.sCn: 将干燥玫瑰花去掉花萼，以手捏碎花瓣部份。烤箱预热至175C/350F。

trans.tranOther: one of the small leaves directly under a flower
